20101228160803.000|20101228160804.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20101228160804.000|20101228160804.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20101228160804.000|20101228160807.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20101228160807.000|20101228160807.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20101228160807.000|20101228160810.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101228160810.000|20101228160810.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101228160810.000|20101228160813.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101228160813.000|20101228160813.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101228160813.000|20101228160813.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101228160813.000|20101228160816.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101228160816.000|20101228160816.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101228160816.000|20101228160819.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101228160819.000|20101228160819.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101228160819.000|20101228160821.000|CC1|          thioridazine

20101228160821.000|20101228160824.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20101228160824.000|20101228160824.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain

20101228160828.000|20101228160830.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.

20101228161826.000|20101228161827.000|CC1|CAN SOMETIMES GO BACK IN MY

20101228161835.000|20101228161836.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BORN IN LIVERPOOL  
20101228161836.000|20101228161840.000|CC1|ON JUNE 14th, 1942, McCARTNEY   
20101228161840.000|20101228161842.000|CC1|WAS INTRODUCED TO MUSIC BY HIS  
20101228161842.000|20101228161842.000|CC1|FATHER.                         
20101228161842.000|20101228161844.000|CC1|THE ACCOMPLISHED JAZZ MUSICIAN, 
20101228161844.000|20101228161845.000|CC1|GAVE HIS SON A TRUMPET.         
20101228161845.000|20101228161846.000|CC1|WHICH A YOUNG PAUL WOULD LATER  
20101228161846.000|20101228161848.000|CC1|TRADE FOR A GUITAR.             
20101228161848.000|20101228161851.000|CC1|>> I ASKED HIM FIRST, I SAID, DO
20101228161851.000|20101228161853.000|CC1|YOU MIND IF I, YOU KNOW, SWAP IT
20101228161853.000|20101228161853.000|CC1|IN?                             
20101228161853.000|20101228161856.000|CC1|HE SAID, NO, THAT'S OKAY.       
20101228161856.000|20101228161857.000|CC1|>> AND YOUR BROTHER SAID AT THAT
20101228161857.000|20101228161859.000|CC1|POINT, WHEN YOU GOT THAT        
20101228161859.000|20101228161859.000|CC1|GUITAR --                       
20101228161859.000|20101228161900.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS IT.                 
20101228161900.000|20101228161901.000|CC1|AND THEN ROCK 'N' ROLL CAME IN  
20101228161901.000|20101228161902.000|CC1|AND I GOT IN A GROUP CALLED THE 
20101228161902.000|20101228161905.000|CC1|QUARRY MEN.

20101228161907.000|20101228161908.000|CC1|LATER THE BEATLES.

20101228161910.000|20101228161912.000|CC1|>> CHARGING AHEAD, THE LADS FROM
20101228161912.000|20101228161914.000|CC1|LIVERPOOL TOOK OVER THE BRITISH 
20101228161914.000|20101228161916.000|CC1|MUSIC SCENE OF THE EARLY '60s.

20101228162049.000|20101228162051.000|CC1|LINDA, McCARTNEY FOUND NEW      
20101228162051.000|20101228162053.000|CC1|CREATIVE GROUND, WITH THE GROUP

20101228162056.000|20101228162058.000|CC1|>> I'VE MADE IT KIND OF MY

20101228162059.000|20101228162100.000|CC1|GROUP WITH WINGS, TO MAKE THAT  
20101228162100.000|20101228162102.000|CC1|SUCCESSFUL.                     
20101228162102.000|20101228162104.000|CC1|I DIDN'T JUST WANT TO BE SORT OF
20101228162104.000|20101228162107.000|CC1|BEATLES COVER BAND.             
20101228162107.000|20101228162110.000|CC1|I WANTED SOMETHING ELSE.        
20101228162110.000|20101228162111.000|CC1|BUT ONCE I'D ESTABLISHED WINGS

20101228163832.000|20101228163833.000|CC1|CIRCUITS RIGHT AWAY.            
20101228163833.000|20101228163833.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S NEXT?                 
20101228163833.000|20101228163836.000|CC1|NEXT IS GOING TO BE AN ENERGY   
20101228163836.000|20101228163838.000|CC1|BOOSTER.                        
20101228163838.000|20101228163840.000|CC1|SO WE START CLAPPING IN AND UP  
20101228163840.000|20101228163843.000|CC1|AND FAST, FAST, FAST, FAST, WHY 
20101228163843.000|20101228163844.000|CC1|DO WE DO THAT?                  
20101228163844.000|20101228163845.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE'RE WAKING CHOSE CHEP 
20101228163845.000|20101228163846.000|CC1|CALS IN THE BRAIN.              
20101228163846.000|20101228163847.000|CC1|THE CHEMICALS IN THE BRAIN,     
20101228163847.000|20101228163848.000|CC1|THEY'RE SO HAPPY WHEN WE MOVE,  
20101228163848.000|20101228163849.000|CC1|RIGHT?                          
20101228163849.000|20101228163850.000|CC1|>> OH, YEAH.                    
20101228163850.000|20101228163854.000|CC1|>> LET'S DO IT.                 
20101228163854.000|20101228163856.000|CC1|ALL THE TIME, UP, UP, UP.       
20101228163856.000|20101228163858.000|CC1|AND THEN, WE START MOVING,      
20101228163858.000|20101228163859.000|CC1|EVERYTHING IS STARTING TO GET   
20101228163859.000|20101228163901.000|CC1|THE MACHINE STARTING TO WORK.   
20101228163901.000|20101228163902.000|CC1|AND THEN WE START TRAINING THE  
20101228163902.000|20101228163903.000|CC1|BRAIN FROM LEFT TO RIGHT.       
20101228163903.000|20101228163904.000|CC1|>> OKAY.                        
20101228163904.000|20101228163906.000|CC1|>> SO MOVEMENTS LIKE FOR        
20101228163906.000|20101228163909.000|CC1|EXAMPLE, DOING LIKE THIS.       
20101228163909.000|20101228163910.000|CC1|>> MULTITASKING.                
20101228163910.000|20101228163911.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20101228163911.000|20101228163913.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE YOUR BRAIN HAS TWO   
20101228163913.000|20101228163914.000|CC1|HEMISPHERES.                    
20101228163914.000|20101228163915.000|CC1|LEFT SIDE OF THE BRAIN CONTROLS 
20101228163915.000|20101228163916.000|CC1|THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE BODY.     
20101228163916.000|20101228163918.000|CC1|SO IT'S VERY IMPORTANT TO TRAIN 
20101228163918.000|20101228163920.000|CC1|THE HEMISPHERES CONSTANTLY BY

20101228163924.000|20101228163924.000|CC1|TIME.
